channel.title: transcriptional regulator on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in transcriptional regulator on funPlantGenes

item.title: AaHD8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaHD8 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Identify a homeodomain-leucine zipper (HD-ZIP) IV transcription factor, AaHD8, directly promoting the expression of AaHD1 for glandular trichome initiation in Artemisia annua.

item.title: AaORA
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaORA Gene Name: octadecanoid-derivative responsive AP2-domain Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: AaTCP15, a JA and ABA dual-responsive teosinte branched1/cycloidea/proliferating (TCP) TF, which is essential for JA and ABA-induced artemisinin biosynthesis by directly binding to and activating the promoters of DBR2 and ALDH1, two genes encoding enzymes for artemisinin biosynthesis.

item.title: AaYABBY5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaYABBY5 Gene Name: YABBY family transcription factor 5 Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Transcriptional regulation of flavonoid biosynthesis in Artemisia annua by AaYABBY5.

item.title: AcNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AcNAC1 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Actinidia chinensis Functional Descriptions: A dramatic decline in fruit citrate induced by mutagenesis of a NAC transcription factor, AcNAC1.

item.title: BpTCP20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BpTCP20 Gene Name: TCP transcription factor 20 Genome: Species: Betula platyphylla Functional Descriptions: Plants overexpressing BpTCP20 displayed increased salt tolerance, and BpTCP20 knockout mutants displayed reduced salt tolerance relative to the wild-type (WT) birch.

item.title: bZIP68;ABI5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb176680 Gene Symbol: bZIP68 ABI5 ZmABF3 ZmbZIP33 Gene Name: bZIP-transcription factor 68 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: CabZIP63
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA01g21080 Gene Symbol: CabZIP63 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Pepper CabZIP63 acts as a positive regulator during Ralstonia solanacearum or high temperature–high humidity challenge in a positive feedback loop with CaWRKY40.

item.title: CKI;EL1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g57940 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0793500 Gene Symbol: CKI EL1 Hd16 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: CRC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CMiso1.1chr10g0266651 Gene Symbol: CRC Gene Name: CRABS CLAW Genome: Melon (Charmono) v1.

item.title: CsbZIP44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g25230 Gene Symbol: CsbZIP44 Gene Name: Genome: Reference genome of sweet orange Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsbZIP44 is essential for ABA-mediated carotenoid biosynthesis in citrus.

item.title: CsHB5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g17870 Gene Symbol: CsHB5 Gene Name: Genome: Reference genome of sweet orange Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsHB5, a positive regulator of ABA and carotenoid-driven processes, activates the expression of CsbZIP44 by binding to its promoter.

item.title: DEP2;EP2
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os07g42410 RAPdb gene ID: Os07g0616000 Gene Symbol: DEP2 EP2 SRS1 OsRELA Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: DkMyb2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DkMyb2 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor2 Genome: Species: Diospyros kaki Functional Descriptions: DkMyb2 wound-induced transcription factor of persimmon (Diospyros kaki Thunb.

item.title: FvMAPK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_7g15060 Gene Symbol: FvMAPK3 Gene Name: MITOGEN-ACTIVATED PROTEIN KINASE 3 Genome: Fragaria vesca ID (v4.

item.title: FvRIF
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_3g20700 Gene Symbol: FvRIF Gene Name: Ripening Inducing Factor Genome: Fragaria vesca Whole Genome v4.

item.title: GbBM
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gbar_A07G008330 Gene Symbol: GbBM Gene Name: Beauty Mark Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: Demonstrate that GbBM directly targets the promoter of four flavonoid biosynthesis genes to positively regulate petal spot development.

item.title: Ghd7
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os07g15770 RAPdb gene ID: Os07g0261200 Gene Symbol: Ghd7 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: GmFVE
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.09G063100 Gene Symbol: GmFVE Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Nuclear factor Y subunit GmNFYA competes with GmHDA13 for interaction with GmFVE to positively regulate salt tolerance in soybean.

item.title: GmJAZ3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.09G123600 Gene Symbol: GmJAZ3 Gene Name: Glycine max JASMONATE-ZIM DOMAIN 3 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmJAZ3 interacts with GmRR18a and GmMYC2a to regulate seed traits in soybean.

item.title: GmMYC2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.01G096600 Gene Symbol: GmMYC2a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmJAZ3 interacted with both G.

item.title: GmNIN1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.04G000600 Gene Symbol: GmNIN1a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The soybean Nodule Inception (GmNINa) gene is a central regulator of soybean nodulation.

item.title: GmPLATZ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.13G147800 Gene Symbol: GmPLATZ Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Global analysis of seed transcriptomes reveals a novel PLATZ regulator for seed size and weight control in soybean.

item.title: GmPTF1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.19G143900 Gene Symbol: GmPTF1a Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Molecular module GmPTF1a/b-GmNPLa regulates rhizobia infection and nodule formation in soybean.

item.title: GmRR11d
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.18G010800.1 Gene Symbol: GmRR11d Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The B-type response regulator GmRR11d mediates systemic inhibition of symbiotic nodulation.

item.title: GmRR18a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.04G062500 Gene Symbol: GmRR18a Gene Name: G.

item.title: GmZF392
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.12G205700 Gene Symbol: GmZF392 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmZF392, a tandem CCCH zinc finger (TZF) protein which was identified in our previous RNA-seq analysis of seed-preferred transcription factors, was found to function as a positive regulator of lipid production.

item.title: GS2;OsGRF4
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os02g47280 RAPdb gene ID: Os02g0701300 Gene Symbol: GS2 OsGRF4 GL2 GLW2 LGS1 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: HvWIN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvWIN1 Gene Name: WAX INDUCER1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: WAX INDUCER1 (HvWIN1) transcription factor regulates free fatty acid biosynthetic genes to reinforce cuticle to resist Fusarium head blight in barley spikelets.

item.title: LeERF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeERF2 Gene Name: Ethylene response factor 2 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Transcriptional Regulation of the Ethylene Response Factor LeERF2 in the Expression of Ethylene Biosynthesis Genes Controls Ethylene Production in Tomato and Tobacco.

item.title: LIC;OsLIC1
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os06g49080 RAPdb gene ID: Os06g0704300 Gene Symbol: LIC OsLIC1 OsLIC OsFLA6 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: MaC2H2-IDD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MaC2H2-IDD Gene Name: Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: MaC2H2-IDD regulates fruit softening and involved in softening disorder induced by cold stress in banana.

item.title: MaMYB16L
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MaMYB16L Gene Name: Genome: Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: The alternative splicing of MaMYB16L might generate a self-controlled regulatory loop to regulate banana fruit ripening.

item.title: MaMYB4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ma03_g21920 Gene Symbol: MaMYB4 Gene Name: Genome: banana A genome Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: We demonstrate that MaMYB4 negatively modulates banana fruit ripening, and that MaMYB4 abundance could be regulated by protein ubiquitination, thus providing insights into the role of MaMYB4 in controlling fruit ripening at both transcriptional and post-translational levels.

item.title: MdARF5-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000143749 Gene Symbol: MdARF5-1 Gene Name: Genome: Malus × domestica genome GDDH13 v 1.

item.title: MdERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000787281 Gene Symbol: MdERF3 Gene Name: ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR3 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: EIN3-LIKE1, MYB1, and ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR3 Act in a Regulatory Loop That Synergistically Modulates Ethylene Biosynthesis and Anthocyanin Accumulation.

item.title: MdHY5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000586302 Gene Symbol: MdHY5 Gene Name: Malus domestica LONG HYPOCOTYL 5 Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MdMAPK3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000237742 Gene Symbol: MdMAPK3 Gene Name: MITOGEN-ACTIVATED PROTEIN KINASE 3 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Ethylene enhances MdMAPK3-mediated phosphorylation of MdNAC72 to promote apple fruit softening.

item.title: MdTCP15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD13G1073500 Gene Symbol: MdTCP15 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Histone deacetylase MdHDA6 is an antagonist in regulation of transcription factor MdTCP15 to promote cold tolerance in apple.

item.title: MdVQ12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MdVQ12 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: MdVQ12, a VQ motif-containing protein, as a positive regulator of apple Valsa canker resistance.

item.title: Sl-ERF.B3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc05g052030 Gene Symbol: Sl-ERF.B3 Gene Name: Ethylene Response Factor Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The chimeric repressor version of an Ethylene Response Factor (ERF) family member, Sl-ERF.

item.title: SlAP2a
